Articles.Content:
K.S.P. Is Awesome
------------------------------

K.S.P. is awesome, everything is cool when your launching the team
K.S.P. is awesome, when you're designing the dream

K.S.P. is better cause parts stick together
Some have said you and I are gonna fly forever?
Lets launch forever
We're the same unlike you, you're like me we're all playing in harmony

K.S.P. is awesome, everything is cool when your launching the team
K.S.P. is awesome, when you're designing the dream

Woooo! 3, 2, 1, go!
Have you heard the news? Everyone’s talkin'
Life is good ‘cause K.S.P. awesome
R.U.D.'ed, there’s a new design
Make some time for the awesome community
I feel more awesome than an awesome possum
Launch that kerbal for Minmus frostin'
Three years later it's Eeloo frostin'
Smellin’ like a blossom, K.S.P. is awesome
Decouplers failed? Now it's S.S.T.O
It’s awesome to win and it’s awesome to lose

K.S.P. is better cause parts stick together
Some have said you and I are gonna fly forever?
Lets launch forever
We're the same unlike you, you're like me we're all playing in harmony

K.S.P. is awesome, everything is cool when your launching the team
K.S.P. is awesome, when you're designing the dream

Blue skies, bouncy gears
We just named two awesome things
A Kobel prize, a piece of string
You know what’s awesome? Everything!
Rockets from Fleas,
A plane using M-Beams
Brand new parts, a very old craft
K.S.P. parts are the best
Tanks and reaction wheels, they’re awesome
R.C.S., Nerv, and Dawn, they’re awesome
Goliath and Juno, they're awesome
Everything you design or launch or crash is awesome

K.S.P. is awesome, everything is cool when your launching the team
K.S.P. is awesome, when you're designing the dream

Edited April 25, 2018 by steuben

Do you want to launch a rocket?
------------------------------

Do you wanna launch a rocket?
Come on, let's go and fly!
The parts are right there, stacked in the VAB
Let them fly away
It's usually quite easy, sometimes not
I wish they could fly
Do you wanna launch a rocket?
It doesn't have to be a rocket.
(Go away, Jeb!)
Okay, bye

Do you wanna launch a rocket?
Or fly a plane around the isles?
I think some airtime is overdue, I've started making lots
of planes from the news
Hang in there, Times
It gets a little boring, all these empty pads
Just watching the days tick by

[musical interlude consisting of several fiery explosions.]

Please, I know you're in there
People are asking where they've been
They say launch again and I'm trying to
The delta v is here. 
Just launch it up.
We only have two buildings, just VAB and SPH
What are we gonna fly?
Do you wanna launch a rocket?
